trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Tillhandahåller data för den <xref href="System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating"> </xref> händelse.

trans-unit.source: You create a handler for the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating> event when you want to customize how the user's credentials are authenticated at run time.
trans-unit.target: Du skapar en hanterare för den <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>händelse när du vill anpassa hur användarens autentiseringsuppgifter har autentiserats vid körning.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>

trans-unit.source: The AuthenticatingEventArgs class supplies values to any <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating> event handler.
trans-unit.target: Klassen AuthenticatingEventArgs ger värden till någon <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>händelsehanteraren.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>

trans-unit.source: By using the properties available in this class, you can retrieve the user credentials to customize authentication.
trans-unit.target: Du kan hämta autentiseringsuppgifter för att anpassa autentisering med hjälp av egenskaperna som är tillgängliga i den här klassen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> class raises the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating> event before validating the user credentials.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>klassen aktiverar den <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>händelse innan verifierar användarautentiseringsuppgifter för.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating> </xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> class constructs an instance of the AuthenticatingEventArgs object and passes it to any <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating> event handler.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>klassen skapas en instans av objektet AuthenticatingEventArgs och skickar den till någon <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>händelsehanteraren.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating> </xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.UserName%2A>, <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Password%2A> and <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.CustomCredential%2A> properties to retrieve the user credentials.
trans-unit.target: Du kan använda den <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.UserName%2A>, <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Password%2A>och <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.CustomCredential%2A>Egenskaper för att hämta användarens autentiseringsuppgifter.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.CustomCredential%2A> </xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Password%2A> </xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.UserName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.CustomCredential%2A> property can contain additional values that are required for authentication, such as an identification number.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.CustomCredential%2A>egenskapen kan innehålla ytterligare värden som krävs för autentisering, exempelvis ett identifieringsnummer.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.CustomCredential%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A> property indicates whether the user credentials are valid.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A>egenskapen anger om användarens autentiseringsuppgifter är giltiga.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A>

trans-unit.source: You set the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A> property to the result of your customized authentication.
trans-unit.target: Du ställer in den <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A>egenskapen på resultatet av dina anpassade autentisering.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A>

trans-unit.source: In addition, you set the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A> property to `true` if you have checked the user credentials and do not want the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> class to check user credentials through the default membership provider.
trans-unit.target: Dessutom kan du ange den <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A>egenskapen `true` om du har kontrollerat användarens autentiseringsuppgifter och inte vill att den <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>klassen för att kontrollera autentiseringsuppgifterna för användaren via standardprovider för medlemskap.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> </xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the user credentials are valid.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger ett värde som anger om användarens autentiseringsuppgifter är giltiga.

trans-unit.source: If you authenticate user credentials in an event handler for the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating> event, set the Authenticated property to indicate whether the user credentials are valid.
trans-unit.target: Om du autentisera användarens identitet i en händelsehanterare för den <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>händelse, ange egenskapen autentiserad som visar om användarens autentiseringsuppgifter är giltiga.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>

trans-unit.source: If the user credentials are valid and no additional validation is needed, set Authenticated to `true` and <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Om användarens autentiseringsuppgifter är giltiga och ingen ytterligare verifiering krävs värdet autentiserad `true` och <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A>till `true`.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A>

trans-unit.source: You set the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A> property to indicate that the authentication service should bypass the default steps for authenticating a user.
trans-unit.target: Du ställer in den <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A>egenskap som anger att tjänsten ska kringgå standard steg för att autentisera en användare.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value in Authenticated is used by the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> class only if <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A> is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Värdet i autentiserad används av den <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>klassen bara om <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A>är inställd på `true`.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A> </xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A> is `false`, the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> class calls the default membership provider to validate user credentials, and then overwrites the value in Authenticated.
trans-unit.target: Om <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A>är `false`, <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>klassen anropar standardprovider för medlemskap för att verifiera autentiseringsuppgifter och skriver över värdet i autentiserad.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> </xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the user credentials are valid; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om användarens autentiseringsuppgifter är giltiga. Annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the user credentials have been authenticated.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger ett värde som anger om användarens autentiseringsuppgifter har autentiserats.

trans-unit.source: You can set the AuthenticationIsComplete property to indicate whether the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> class must authenticate the user credentials.
trans-unit.target: Du kan ange egenskapen AuthenticationIsComplete för att ange om den <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>klassen måste autentisera användaruppgifter.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>

trans-unit.source: If AuthenticationIsComplete is `true`, the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> class does not validate the user credentials through the default membership provider.
trans-unit.target: Om AuthenticationIsComplete `true`, <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>klassen validerar inte användarens autentiseringsuppgifter via standardprovider för medlemskap.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>

trans-unit.source: Instead, it uses the value in <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A> to determine whether to create an authentication cookie.
trans-unit.target: Används i stället värdet i <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A>att avgöra om du vill skapa en autentiseringscookie.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A>

trans-unit.source: If AuthenticationIsComplete is `false`, the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> class validates the user credentials through the default membership provider and overwrites the value in the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Om AuthenticationIsComplete `false`, <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>klassen validerar användarens autentiseringsuppgifter via standardprovider för medlemskap och skriver över värdet i den <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A> </xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if all the steps for validating the user credentials have been performed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om alla steg för att validera användarens autentiseringsuppgifter har genomförts. Annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets additional user values for authentication.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar ytterligare värden för autentisering.

trans-unit.source: You can use the CustomCredential property to retrieve authentication values other than user name and password during the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating> event.
trans-unit.target: Du kan använda egenskapen CustomCredential för att hämta autentisering värden förutom användarnamn och lösenord under den <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>händelse.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>

trans-unit.source: For example, an application might be configured to validate an identification number together with the user name and password.
trans-unit.target: Ett program kan exempelvis konfigureras för att verifiera ett identifieringsnummer tillsammans med användarnamn och lösenord.

trans-unit.source: In that case, the identification number will be passed in the `CustomCredential` parameter of the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Login%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: I så fall ID-numret skickas i den `CustomCredential` parameter för den <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Login%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Login%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can then retrieve the custom value through the CustomCredential property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan sedan hämta anpassat värde via egenskapen CustomCredential.

trans-unit.source: The CustomCredential property contains the customized values in the same format as they are passed to the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Login%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen CustomCredential innehåller de anpassade värdena i samma format som de överförs till den <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Login%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Login%2A>

trans-unit.source: In the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating> event handler, if more than one value is stored in the property, you must parse the value of the CustomCredential property to retrieve the values.
trans-unit.target: I den <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>händelsehanteraren om fler än ett värde som är lagrat i egenskapen, det parsa värdet på egenskapen CustomCredential att hämta värden.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>

trans-unit.source: The values required for authentication other than user name and password.
trans-unit.target: De värden som krävs för autentisering än användarnamn och lösenord.

trans-unit.source: Gets the password for the user.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar lösenordet för användaren.

trans-unit.source: You use the Password property to retrieve the password during the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating> event.
trans-unit.target: Du kan använda egenskapen lösenord för att hämta lösenord under den <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>händelse.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>

trans-unit.source: The password to validate.
trans-unit.target: Lösenord för att verifiera.

trans-unit.source: Gets the authentication name for the user.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar autentiseringsnamnet för användaren.

trans-unit.source: You use the UserName property to retrieve the authentication name during the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating> event.
trans-unit.target: Du använder egenskapen UserName för att hämta autentiseringsnamnet på under den <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>händelse.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>

trans-unit.source: The user name to validate.
trans-unit.target: Att verifiera användarnamnet.
